name: weir
definition: a low dam built across a river to raise the water level upstream

name: miserablist
definition: a person who appears to enjoy being depressed, esp a performer of or listener to gloomy music

name: autarky
definition: economic independence or self-sufficiency

name: slue
definition: turn or slide violently or uncontrollably in a particular direction.

name: toyetic
definition: potentially marketable as a toy or having merchandising potential

name: elucubrate
definition: to solve, write, or compose by working studiously at all hours

name: scripturient
definition: having a strong urge to write

name: oryx
definition: a species of large antelopes

name: lustration
definition: a rite of purification, especially washing

name: saturnine
definition: slow and gloomy

name: orts
definition: table scraps

name: glabrous
definition: free from hair or down; smooth

name: loge
definition: a small enclosure or booth in a theatre or arena

name: cachinnate
definition: to laugh loudly or immoderately

name: varietist
definition: one who varies from the norm
source: The Decline And Fall Of Practically Everybody

name: sestet
definition: the last six lines of a sonnet

name: impecunious
definition: having little or no money

name: doctrinaire
definition: seeking to impose a doctrine in all circumstances without regard to practical considerations.

name: arrant
definition: complete; utter

name: goldbrick
definition: invent excuses to avoid a task; shirk.

name: cartouche
definition: a carved tablet or drawing representing a scroll with rolled-up ends

name: timpani
definition: kettledrums, especially when played by one musician in an orchestra

name: coati
definition: a type of raccoon with a long snout and a striped tail

name: besserwisser
definition: know-it-all, wiseguy, wiseacre, smart aleck

name: olio
definition: a miscellaneous collection of things

name: eunoia
definition: beautiful thinking

name: amphigory
definition: nonsense verse

name: phrontistery
definition: a place for studying

name: enchiridion
definition: carried reference book

name: apothegm
definition: short, witty aphorism

name: selcouth
definition: strange; unfamiliar; marvelous

name: piste
definition: a ski run of compacted snow.

name: autochthonous
definition: native to the place where found (ant. allochthonous)

name: polity
definition: an organized society; a state as a political entity

name: calf
definition: a floating piece of ice detached from an iceberg.
